Interface IRegistrationController

All Known Implementing Classes:
RegistrationController
public interface IRegistrationController
Interface defining the contract for managing officer registrations for BTO housing projects.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    approveRegistration(OfficerRegistration registration)
    Approves an officer registration for a project.
    List<OfficerRegistration>
    getAllRegistrations()
    Retrieves all officer registrations in the system.

    registerOfficer(HDBOfficer officer, Project project)
    Registers an officer for a project.
    boolean
    rejectRegistration(OfficerRegistration registration)
    Rejects an officer registration for a project.
    void
    setRegistrations(List<OfficerRegistration> registrationList)
    Sets the registrations from a list of OfficerRegistration objects.
    boolean
    updateProjectSlots(Project project)
    Updates the available officer slots for a project.
    List<OfficerRegistration>
    viewRegistrationStatus(HDBOfficer officer)
    Retrieves all registrations for a specific officer.

  • Method Details

    • registerOfficer

      OfficerRegistration registerOfficer(HDBOfficer officer, Project project)
      Registers an officer for a project.
      Parameters:
      officer - The HDBOfficer to register
      project - The Project to register for
      Returns:
      The created OfficerRegistration object, or null if no slots available

    • approveRegistration

      boolean approveRegistration(OfficerRegistration registration)
      Approves an officer registration for a project.
      Parameters:
      registration - The OfficerRegistration to approve
      Returns:
      true if successful, false if the registration is invalid

    • rejectRegistration

      boolean rejectRegistration(OfficerRegistration registration)
      Rejects an officer registration for a project.
      Parameters:
      registration - The OfficerRegistration to reject
      Returns:
      true if successful, false if the registration is invalid

    • viewRegistrationStatus

      List<OfficerRegistration> viewRegistrationStatus(HDBOfficer officer)
      Retrieves all registrations for a specific officer.
      Parameters:
      officer - The HDBOfficer whose registrations to view
      Returns:
      List of OfficerRegistration objects for the specified officer

    • getAllRegistrations

      List<OfficerRegistration> getAllRegistrations()
      Retrieves all officer registrations in the system.
      Returns:
      List of all OfficerRegistration objects

    • updateProjectSlots

      boolean updateProjectSlots(Project project)
      Updates the available officer slots for a project.
      Parameters:
      project - The Project to update
      Returns:
      true if slots were updated, false if no slots available

    • setRegistrations

      void setRegistrations(List<OfficerRegistration> registrationList)
      Sets the registrations from a list of OfficerRegistration objects.
      Parameters:
      registrationList - The list of OfficerRegistration objects to set
